name: Steering Not Included - GMTK2020
description:
You're making a daring escape from the cops in a hot pursuit after a bank heist, but suddenly your steering wheel breaks! Now you must avoid the cop cars and police barricades by indirectly controlling your car using text commands on the car's built in computer!

Steering Not Included is a game developed in under 48 hours for GMTK Jam 2020

(Although I didn't start until 15 hours before the deadline lol)
